data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zamanpoore, Mehrdad, Poeckl, Manfred, Grabowski, Michal, Schiemer, Friedrich (2009): Two new sympatric species of freshwater Gammarus (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from Southern Zagros Region, Iran. Zootaxa 2136: 21-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.188493
